generated_body: If you choose to read "Most distant world ever explored gets new name: Arrokoth," you might expect an informative piece detailing the recent developments regarding the distant celestial object known as Arrokoth. The article is likely to outline its significance in the context of space exploration, including insights into its discovery and the scientific missions that have contributed to our understanding of it. Additionally, it may discuss the implications of its new name and what this reveals about our ongoing exploration of the outer solar system. The piece could also provide some background on how objects like Arrokoth are classified and studied in astronomy.
